template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a high-stakes professional task in {regulated_domain} that requires structured analysis, identifying risks or compliance issues, proposing revisions, and delivering both technical and executive summaries; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a high-stakes professional task in pharmaceutical clinical trials that requires structured analysis, identifying risks or compliance issues, proposing revisions, and delivering both technical and executive summaries; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Review this draft clinical trial protocol to identify risks and compliance gaps, propose revisions, and deliver both a technical summary for the study team and an executive summary for leadership.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise prompt under 45 words for a high-stakes task in pharmaceutical clinical trials. The task needs to cover structured analysis, risk identification, compliance issues, proposed revisions, and both technical and executive summaries.

Okay, I can focus on a common high-stakes scenario like a clinical trial protocol review. That involves checking for risks, compliance gaps, and suggesting fixes. The prompt should also specify the need for two types of summaries. 

Let me draft something tight: start with the action ("review this draft"), include the key elements (analysis, risks, compliance, revisions), and end with the deliverable (summaries). Yes, that fits under 45 words and covers all requirements.
